snippet: A judge ordered Arkansas officials on Tuesday to recognize more than 500 same-sex marriages performed in the state last year.
abstract: Arkansas Judge Wendell Griffen orders state officials to recognize over 500 same-sex marriages performed in 2014, licenses for which were issued in wake of another judge striking down voter-approved same-sex marriage ban.
lead_paragraph: A judge ordered Arkansas officials on Tuesday to recognize more than 500 same-sex marriages performed in the state last year.

headline.main: Arkansas: State Told to Recognize Same-Sex Marriages
headline.print_headline: Arkansas: State Told to Recognize Same-Sex Marriages

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
